remarks: Subtractive distributive law for the scalar product of a complex vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 31-Jul-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
vci.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` W ) $.
vci.2 $e |- S = ( 2nd ` W ) $.
vci.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
vcsubdir $p |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A - B ) S C ) = ( ( A S C ) G ( -u 1 S ( B S C ) ) ) ) $.
